programme.title: Clinton's medical reforms
programme.short_synopsis: Can Clinton push ahead with medical reform following a Republican victory in the Senate?
programme.medium_synopsis: The Republican landslide Senate victory leads Alistair Cooke to critique Clinton's medical reform and recalls presidents who have triumphed in the face of adversity.
